ComicInfo.Title: Underground Primer; Real Psychic - Vampire Tales; Judy Forever; The Rory Story; Just Swingin' Along with the Breeze; A Tale of the Most Improbable Qualities of "Is"; Glimpses in the Life of Grover C. Bergdoll; Twisted Desire!
ComicInfo.Summary:
Underground Primer: Harold, a radical activist, accidentally blows himself up.
Real Psychic - Vampire Tales: The guru disappears after being hit in the face with an acid-laced pie.
Judy Forever: Judy and her pirate mates raid a spaceship.
The Rory Story: Rory and Pooh go out for a stroll in the pouring rain.
Just Swingin' Along with the Breeze: Gretchen's very good friends hatch a plot against her involving "throwing" her away in a box on her birthday party.
A Tale of the Most Improbable Qualities of "Is": Truncated bio of the early aviator/race car driver and onetime felon and draft dodger.
Glimpses in the Life of Grover C. Bergdoll: Linda goes out with Doug but Johnny is heartbroken because of his love for Johnny.
Twisted Desire!: The fat lady is drinking heavily and performing fellatio in her trailer.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-19 15:13:38. [CVDB185376] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 17:11:55. [Issue ID 277629]
